短线段导致圆弧不相切也生成（半径减小）: Generate even if segment is too short (reduce radius)
记录当前的布线状态: Record current routing state for restoration
确定要恢复到此状态吗？: Are you sure you want to restore to this state?
平滑布线时是否自动处理线宽过渡?: Automatically handle width transitions when beautifying?
是否启用调试模式？（在日志栏打印信息）: Enable debug mode? (Print information in the console)
未找到可以圆滑的拐角（需要至少2条连续导线形成拐角）: No corners found to beautify (requires at least 2 continuous tracks)
控制圆弧过渡的半径大小: Controls the maximum radius of the arc transition
圆滑布线时是否自动处理不同线宽的过渡: Automatically handle width transitions when beautifying
线宽过渡的渐变段数，越大越平滑: Number of gradient segments for width transition, larger is smoother
过渡区长度比率: Max ratio of transition length to width difference, won't exceed narrow track length
在控制台打印详细日志: Print detailed logs in the console
有个拐角的半径因导线过短被自动缩小: {{count}} corners were automatically scaled down due to short tracks
确定要恢复到此状态吗？当前未保存的更改将丢失。: Are you sure you want to restore? Current unsaved changes will be lost.
确定要清除所有快照吗？: Are you sure you want to clear all snapshots?

!!! SEVERE WARNING: PCB ID MISMATCH !!!

This will likely corrupt your layout!
This will likely corrupt your layout!
This will likely corrupt your layout!

System will try to backup current state. Continue?
确定要恢复到此快照状态吗？当前画布将被覆盖。: Restore this snapshot? Current canvas will be overwritten.
快照所属PCB与当前PCB不一致，强制恢复可能导致未知的错误，是否继续？: Current PCB does not match snapshot PCB. Continue restoration?
没有找到当前PCB的可撤销快照: No undo snapshot found for current PCB
当前布线状态与最新快照一致，无需重复创建: Current state matches the latest snapshot. No need to create new one.
控制圆弧过渡的最大半径大小: Controls the maximum arc transition radius
防止段数过多导致卡顿: Max gradient segments for width transition, prevents lag from too many segments
过渡区长度与线宽差值的最大比率，实际长度不超过窄端线长: Max ratio of transition length to width difference; actual length won't exceed narrow track length
生成圆弧时检查是否违反间距规则: Check spacing rule violations when generating arcs (against nearby Pads/Tracks)
圆弧与周围物体的最小距离: Minimum distance between arcs and surrounding objects (recommend 6mil+)
自动合并过短的中间线段以生成圆弧: Automatically merge short intermediate segments to generate arcs

!!! WARNING: PCB ID MISMATCH !!!

This may corrupt your data. System will try to backup current state. Continue?
确定恢复快照？当前未保存的修改将丢失。: Restore snapshot? Unsaved changes will be lost.
